lines.text: I mean is it my fault? Misguided, too young to know, mistaken, too proud to listen, mislead, careless of danger, misunderstood, misjudge, misbegotten.
This is one of my really ugly days.
You see, all stretched and the lines - well I know, laugh lines, but who needs them?
My hair. Maybe I was tarred and feathered. Was I, Jess, tarred and feathered?
I wish I didn't believe absolutely everything absolutely everyone tells me.
I'm a great disappointment to my mother.
It's alright for you. You look at you in the mornings. I have to look at me.
Well, you know, just a little maybe, around the edges.
My mother can see a baby clear ten months away.

today I'll be different, today I'll be happy, today I'll sparkle. Today... By ten o'clock it's gone. I'm dull, I'm dead, I'm me. I can't be different. Oh I can be what you want when I'm with you and I can be what he wants when I'm with him. But I'm not with him and I'm not with you all the time. I'm with me and I know and that's it. I mean that IS IT.
